text: Kya tere Rubb ki rehmat yeh log takseem karte hain? Duniya ki zindagi mein inki guzar basar ke zaraye to humne inke darmiyan takseem kiye hain, Aur in mein se kuch logon ko kuch dusre logon par humne badarja-ha fauqiyat di hai taa-ke yeh ek dusre se khidmat lein aur tere Rubb ki rehmat us daulat se zyada keemati hai jo (inke rahees) samait rahe hain
